metadata.name: MagRandy
metadata.description:
In 1946, Belgian surrealist painter Ren√© Magritte painted perhaps his best known work, a self portrait called "Son of Man".

In 2001, Randy Johnson, "The Big Unit," star pitcher for the Arizona Diamonbacks, pitched a fastball during a spring training game against the San Francisco Giants that against all odds, hit a bird that happened to fly into the ball's path.  The pitch was ruled dead, as well as the bird.
